name: Vampire's Bullet Hell Survivor TD
description:
Build Turrets, socket them with Weapons and Support items to empower them!

Stand near Turrets to repair them!

Upgrade Item Tier to generate stronger, entirely new types of items!

"Upgrade Slots" to increase number of Support item slots!

Esc will pause and Tab will open and close the shop menu!

Leave a comment with any impressions you have :)

This is a very original game
